title: This Is the It Girl Way to Style Your Tried-and-True Adidas Sambas
description: Put your best foot forward this spring.
excerpt: Put your best foot forward this spring.
text: If there’s one sneaker that has taken over the fashion world by storm, it’s most definitely the Adidas Samba. The shoe has been spotted on countless celebs, including street style stars Kendall Jenner, Hailey Bieber, and Katie Holmes, to name a few. The best thing about wearing the now-iconic soccer shoe? Its unmatched comfort. After all, few things rival adding a cool sneaker to your outfits since you know you’ll be able to stay nimble on your toes all day long.This slim-fit sneaker is the perfect match for jeans and a T-shirt, but you can also add a casual touch to a more polished dress or make an unexpectedly fun pairing with patterned skirts. And while you may typically see this sneaker in its black or white colorways, it comes in a huge assortment of more colorful (and spring-appropriate) options, too.Below, I’ve rounded up some of the best ways to sport your Adidas Sambas, as demonstrated by It girls, street style mavens, and other stylish women and how to get the look. Scroll on to see them all.A Navy Bomber with a Pop of Red Bellocqimages/Bauer-Griffin//Getty ImagesWhen it comes to street style stars, few have captured the attention of fashion lovers quite like Hailey Bieber, as she makes every outfit feel effortless. Pair your light-wash denim with a classic bomber jacket in navy, and add a pair of red Sambas for a cool and laid-back look.Heaven Mayhem Terre HoopsAIRE AviorCos Oversized Wool Bomber JacketMother The Half Pipe Ankle JeansAdidas Samba OG Coordinating Cognac BrownsGotham//Getty ImagesBella Hadid knows that coordinating colors is the secret to a quick and cute ’fit. Pair your classic Sambas like the top model by picking one color to incorporate into your outfit.Miu Miu Women’s SunglassesAeron Bloom Lambskin Bomber JacketAYR The Sexy FlexyGood American Good Petite Bootcut Jeans Now 30% OffAdidas Samba OGAn Easy Button-Up ShirtGotham//Getty ImagesOne of the easiest ways to style Sambas is with a classic button-up shirt. A light blue poplin shirt is dressed down beautifully with a white Samba in a way that still feels crisp and polished. Keep your jeans on the lighter side to match the breezy look.Tom Ford Dimitry Half-Rim Aviator SunglassesRails Ingrid Collared Button-Down ShirtShort-Sleeve Baby Crewneck TeeHIDDEN JEANS Double Crossover High Waist Wide Leg Jeansadidas Samba OG ShoesA Classic White T-shirt and JeansRoy Rochlin//Getty ImagesNothing is more classic than jeans and a clean white tee. Add in a black Samba like Katie Holmes and a pop of color for a quick outfit that’s timeless and cool. Warby Parker CarmelLeset Classic Margo TeeCitizens of Humanity Annina High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Mansur Gavriel Mini Candy BagAdidas Samba OGA Denim Jacket and Striped Track Pants Jeremy Moeller//Getty ImagesSambas don’t have to be reserved for jeans; they’re practical for laid-back everyday looks, too. Double up on stripes to create an effortlessly stylish ensemble when paired together. This look proves that committing to an all-over stripe outfit can work, ensuring you’ll be the most polished person in track pants and sneakers.Rag & Bone Miramar Jaiden Denim Shirt JacketAdidas Adibreak PantsNow 60% OffGucci Jackie Small Shoulder BagMejuri Dôme Figure RingAdidas SambasHints of Burgundy and BrownRaimonda Kulikauskiene//Getty ImagesDress like a street style star and reach for burgundy and brown tones to highlight your favorite Sambas. Tuckernuck Stripe Harry Rugby PoloRalph Lauren The Ricky SkirtAWS/American Made Slouchy Scrunch Cotton Slouch SocksCoach Bowery Satchel 22Adidas Samba OGA Leopard Print Jacket and Checkered Hat Jeremy Moeller//Getty ImagesPatterns feel even more playful when mixed. Checker and leopard feel cohesive with neutral staples like cream trousers and a black Samba to add balance. CORIRESHA Plaid Beanie Cuff Knit Hat Ganni Leopard-Print Canvas JacketToteme Jersey Maxi DressBombas Modern Rib Calf SocksAdidas Samba OGBrown Knits and a Coordinating BagStreetstyleshooters//Getty ImagesWearing head-to-toe brown is anything but boring when you incorporate different textures and add a Samba for a pop of white to balance everything out. Loewe Logo Acetate Square SunglassesZara Plain High Collar SweaterRóhe Suede Midi SkirtTom Ford Audrey Medium Tote BagAdidas Samba OG Sneaker A Classic Blazer and Straight-leg JeansEdward Berthelot//Getty ImagesIf the dress code at your office is a little more laid back, then pairing your favorite brown blazer and gray jeans with your OG Sambas will not only feel appropriate but cool, too.Ettika Curved Square Drop EarringsAritzia Power BlazerRag & Bone Miramar Terry Shea PantNow 95% OffDonna Karan New York Glenwood Shoulder BagAdidas Samba OG A Casual Hoodie with a Glamorous Faux Fur Jeremy Moeller//Getty ImagesWinter layering doesn’t have to feel one-note. Switch things up by layering an oversized statement faux fur over your zippered hoodie for a twist on classic street style. Plus, you’ll stay extra toasty without sacrificing style.Kate Spade New York Cuff Beanie Apparis Sai Faux-Fur Short CoatJ.Crew New Heritage Fleece Zip-up HoodieNow 44% OffAritzia Agency PantAdidas Samba OGA Transitional White Maxi Dress With an Oversized BlazerJeremy Moeller//Getty ImagesForget the fashion rules—white is a year-round hue. And one easy way to wear it is in the form of a maxi skirt layered with a gray blazer. It’s the answer to an unfussy outfit for days where you’ll want to look and feel your best while also staying practical on your toes. A pair of Sambas will make the entire look fresh and interesting. Givenchy Day 55mm Round Sunglasses Everlane The Oversized BlazerNicholas the Label Tavia Strapless Godet Maxi DressStaud Leather Moon BagAdidas Samba OG A Cashmere Sweater and Classic SunglassesBellocqimages/Bauer-Griffin//Getty ImagesElegant without feeling forced, a cashmere sweater and statement sunglasses are timeless. To make the ensemble feel more laid back, Sambas not only make this more comfortable but also more relaxed instead of a traditional ladylike shoe, especially when paired with a structured bag like this Saint Laurent. html:
If there’s one sneaker that has taken over the fashion world by storm, it’s most definitely the Adidas Samba. The shoe has been spotted on countless celebs, including street style stars Kendall Jenner, Hailey Bieber, and Katie Holmes, to name a few. The best thing about wearing the now-iconic soccer shoe? Its unmatched comfort. After all, few things rival adding a cool sneaker to your outfits since you know you’ll be able to stay nimble on your toes all day long.

This slim-fit sneaker is the perfect match for jeans and a T-shirt, but you can also add a casual touch to a more polished dress or make an unexpectedly fun pairing with patterned skirts. And while you may typically see this sneaker in its black or white colorways, it comes in a huge assortment of more colorful (and spring-appropriate) options, too.

Below, I’ve rounded up some of the best ways to sport your Adidas Sambas, as demonstrated by It girls, street style mavens, and other stylish women and how to get the look. Scroll on to see them all.

A Navy Bomber with a Pop of Red

When it comes to street style stars, few have captured the attention of fashion lovers quite like Hailey Bieber, as she makes every outfit feel effortless. Pair your light-wash denim with a classic bomber jacket in navy, and add a pair of red Sambas for a cool and laid-back look.

Heaven Mayhem Terre Hoops

AIRE Avior

Cos Oversized Wool Bomber Jacket

Mother The Half Pipe Ankle Jeans

Adidas Samba OG

Coordinating Cognac Browns

Bella Hadid knows that coordinating colors is the secret to a quick and cute ’fit. Pair your classic Sambas like the top model by picking one color to incorporate into your outfit.

Miu Miu Women’s Sunglasses

Aeron Bloom Lambskin Bomber Jacket

AYR The Sexy Flexy

Good American Good Petite Bootcut Jeans

Now 30% Off

Adidas Samba OG

An Easy Button-Up Shirt

One of the easiest ways to style Sambas is with a classic button-up shirt. A light blue poplin shirt is dressed down beautifully with a white Samba in a way that still feels crisp and polished. Keep your jeans on the lighter side to match the breezy look.

Tom Ford Dimitry Half-Rim Aviator Sunglasses

Rails Ingrid Collared Button-Down Shirt

Short-Sleeve Baby Crewneck Tee

HIDDEN JEANS Double Crossover High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

adidas Samba OG Shoes

A Classic White T-shirt and Jeans

Nothing is more classic than jeans and a clean white tee. Add in a black Samba like Katie Holmes and a pop of color for a quick outfit that’s timeless and cool.

Warby Parker Carmel

Leset Classic Margo Tee

Citizens of Humanity Annina High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

Mansur Gavriel Mini Candy Bag

Adidas Samba OG

A Denim Jacket and Striped Track Pants

Sambas don’t have to be reserved for jeans; they’re practical for laid-back everyday looks, too. Double up on stripes to create an effortlessly stylish ensemble when paired together. This look proves that committing to an all-over stripe outfit can work, ensuring you’ll be the most polished person in track pants and sneakers.

Rag & Bone Miramar Jaiden Denim Shirt Jacket

Adidas Adibreak Pants

Now 60% Off

Gucci Jackie Small Shoulder Bag

Mejuri Dôme Figure Ring

Adidas Sambas

Hints of Burgundy and Brown

Dress like a street style star and reach for burgundy and brown tones to highlight your favorite Sambas.

Tuckernuck Stripe Harry Rugby Polo

Ralph Lauren The Ricky Skirt

AWS/American Made Slouchy Scrunch Cotton Slouch Socks

Coach Bowery Satchel 22

Adidas Samba OG

A Leopard Print Jacket and Checkered Hat

Patterns feel even more playful when mixed. Checker and leopard feel cohesive with neutral staples like cream trousers and a black Samba to add balance.

CORIRESHA Plaid Beanie Cuff Knit Hat

Ganni Leopard-Print Canvas Jacket

Toteme Jersey Maxi Dress

Bombas Modern Rib Calf Socks

Adidas Samba OG

Brown Knits and a Coordinating Bag

Wearing head-to-toe brown is anything but boring when you incorporate different textures and add a Samba for a pop of white to balance everything out.

Loewe Logo Acetate Square Sunglasses

Zara Plain High Collar Sweater

Róhe Suede Midi Skirt

Tom Ford Audrey Medium Tote Bag

Adidas Samba OG Sneaker

A Classic Blazer and Straight-leg Jeans

If the dress code at your office is a little more laid back, then pairing your favorite brown blazer and gray jeans with your OG Sambas will not only feel appropriate but cool, too.

Ettika Curved Square Drop Earrings

Aritzia Power Blazer

Rag & Bone Miramar Terry Shea Pant

Now 95% Off

Donna Karan New York Glenwood Shoulder Bag

Adidas Samba OG

A Casual Hoodie with a Glamorous Faux Fur

Winter layering doesn’t have to feel one-note. Switch things up by layering an oversized statement faux fur over your zippered hoodie for a twist on classic street style. Plus, you’ll stay extra toasty without sacrificing style.

Kate Spade New York Cuff Beanie

Apparis Sai Faux-Fur Short Coat

J.Crew New Heritage Fleece Zip-up Hoodie

Now 44% Off

Aritzia Agency Pant

Adidas Samba OG

A Transitional White Maxi Dress With an Oversized Blazer

Forget the fashion rules—white is a year-round hue. And one easy way to wear it is in the form of a maxi skirt layered with a gray blazer. It’s the answer to an unfussy outfit for days where you’ll want to look and feel your best while also staying practical on your toes. A pair of Sambas will make the entire look fresh and interesting.

Givenchy Day 55mm Round Sunglasses

Everlane The Oversized Blazer

Nicholas the Label Tavia Strapless Godet Maxi Dress

Staud Leather Moon Bag

Adidas Samba OG

A Cashmere Sweater and Classic Sunglasses

Elegant without feeling forced, a cashmere sweater and statement sunglasses are timeless. To make the ensemble feel more laid back, Sambas not only make this more comfortable but also more relaxed instead of a traditional ladylike shoe, especially when paired with a structured bag like this Saint Laurent.

ANINE BING Indio Sunglasses

Vince Boiled Cashmere Turtleneck Pullover

Now 30% Off

Moussy Vintage Ridgefield Straight Low-Rise Jeans

Saint Laurent Sac De Jour Leather Satchel

Adidas Samba OG
